## About Me

Hi! My name is Sarahy Martinez (pronounced as Sad-uh-ee) and I graduated from UC San Diego with with a major in Public Health concentration in Epidemiology. I am currently a 2nd year Masters in Public student at Columbia Mailman studying Epidemiology with a concentration in Biostatistics and Public Health Data Science.
